rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: The entrance lobby acts as a transitional space from the garden to interior living areas.

rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: A combined open-plan area that flows into an adjoining dining area, featuring Mediterranean elements such as terracotta tiles and exposed wood beams.

rooms.name: Open-Concept Kitchen
rooms.description: An integrated kitchen with modern appliances, designed with natural stone countertops. Vastu compliant layout to ensure harmony.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed for relaxation and privacy with ample storage. It includes a spacious balcony following Mediterranean style detailing.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable secondary bedroom with ample natural light, featuring its own private balcony.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: An office space dedicated to work and study, designed with a Vastu oriented layout for concentration and productivity.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A guest bedroom offering comfortable lodging during visits.
